admin_update_all_profiles.name: admin_update_all_profiles

admin_read_all_comments.name: admin_read_all_comments

sales_read_assigned_lead_comments.name: sales_read_assigned_lead_comments
sales_read_assigned_lead_comments.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM leads
        WHERE leads.id = "lead_comments"."lead_id"
        AND leads.assigned_to = (select auth.uid())
      )

user_insert_comments.name: user_insert_comments
user_insert_comments.withCheck:
"lead_comments"."author_id" = (select auth.uid()) AND (
          (SELECT role FROM profiles WHERE id = (select auth.uid())) = 'admin'
          OR EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM leads
            WHERE leads.id = "lead_comments"."lead_id"
            AND leads.assigned_to = (select auth.uid())
          )
        )

admin_delete_any_comment.name: admin_delete_any_comment

admin_read_all_history.name: admin_read_all_history

sales_read_assigned_lead_history.name: sales_read_assigned_lead_history
sales_read_assigned_lead_history.using:
EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM leads
        WHERE leads.id = "lead_history"."lead_id"
        AND leads.assigned_to = (select auth.uid())
      )

user_insert_history.name: user_insert_history
user_insert_history.withCheck:
"lead_history"."actor_id" = (select auth.uid()) AND (
          (SELECT role FROM profiles WHERE id = (select auth.uid())) = 'admin'
          OR EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 FROM leads
            WHERE leads.id = "lead_history"."lead_id"
            AND leads.assigned_to = (select auth.uid())
          )
        )

users_read_all_target_banners.name: users_read_all_target_banners
users_read_all_target_banners.using: "system_banners"."is_active" = true AND "system_banners"."target_audience" = 'all' AND ("system_banners"."expires_at" IS NULL OR "system_banners"."expires_at" > now())

admin_read_admin_target_banners.name: admin_read_admin_target_banners
admin_read_admin_target_banners.using: "system_banners"."is_active" = true AND "system_banners"."target_audience" = 'admin' AND public.get_user_role() = 'admin' AND ("system_banners"."expires_at" IS NULL OR "system_banners"."expires_at" > now())
